attributes.action: Making people feel safe/ help when asking for help when out in clubs/ pubs
attributes.additional_details:
To make people of all sexuality’s safe when going out with friends and knowing there is help behind the bar when this is being asked. 
I feel people would benefit this and we shouldn’t just dismiss men.
As they should also be included in something important and safe
attributes.background:
How women have a safe word “ask Angela” if they’re being harassed or in an uncomfortable setting. I think men should have their own safe word and be different in each club or pub. 
As men can also be harassed, raped etc. specially people of the gay community. 
To be displayed in mens toilets also

rejection.details: The scheme referred to in the petition is not a Government scheme. As the petition does not call for action on something which the Government or UK Parliament is responsible for we are unable to accept it.
